page.title: 05THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE (cont)
page.content: The Ford Factory in Liverpool was built in 1962 at a cost of Â£38,000,000 The first car built was the Anglia, which went into production in 1963. Since then the factory has produced over 4 million cars.Currently it makes Escorts and Orions. The factory operates day and night, all year,apart from the holidays.The men work shifts. By Michelle Barlow. The Glaxo Company makes drugs and medicines, which are sold all over the world. Glaxo is a multi-national company, which means it has factories in many countries.Some multi-nationals have more money than small countries. Glaxo owns lots of smaller companies like Farleys baby foods. Last year it made Â£256 million pounds profit. By Leslie Seville. St.Christophers School.
